verses.name: Proverbs 6:13
verses.text: He winketh with his eyes, he speaketh with his feet, he teacheth with his fingers;

verses.name: Proverbs 6:14
verses.text: Frowardness is in his heart, he deviseth mischief continually; he soweth discord.

verses.name: Proverbs 6:15
verses.text: Therefore shall his calamity come suddenly; suddenly shall he be broken without remedy.

verses.name: Proverbs 6:16
verses.text: These six things doth the Lord hate: yea, seven are an abomination unto him:

verses.name: Proverbs 6:17
verses.text: A proud look, a lying tongue, and hands that shed innocent blood,

verses.name: Proverbs 6:18
verses.text: An heart that deviseth wicked imaginations, feet that be swift in running to mischief,

verses.name: Proverbs 6:19
verses.text: A false witness that speaketh lies, and he that soweth discord among brethren.
